text: @realDonaldTrump I want to know why you are Not helping our #NavajoNation  with the PPE much needed?? You claimed you are doing such a good with #COVID19 so why South Korea have to help them instead the USA? Is American #NavajoNation, isn’t? #TrumpFailedAmerica  https://t.co/7fkF38iss2
